title: some Buffalo pics
content:
It's taken me a while, but I finally uploaded some pics I took in Buffalo when I was at Typecon.

[http://signobserver.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120729161330/http:/signobserver.wordpress.com/ "http://signobserver.wordpress.com/")

I should have made the images smaller for the blog. Sorry 'bout that. To see the part that's chopped off... you know what to do.

-=R=-
author: russellm

comments.content: Hey Russell. Good finds. You should sign up for a free [Flickr](http://web.archive.org/web/20120729161330/http:/flickr.com/) account. It will automatically resize your images to a width that will fit your blog and provide embedding code.
